ccm:application.name: ccm-ldn-portalworkspace-homepage
ccm:application.ccm:description:
Extension for ccm-portalworkspace to provide a custom frontpage for a site. It uses a popular 3 column design (hardcoded unmutable) using 3 panes which may further be divided into columns.
DEPRECATED as of version 6.6.0. Will be removed in an upcomming release. Use a standard portal page, instead. As to current codumentation, the standard page is capable to provide all the functions of portalspace-homepage module, as well as additional capabilities as integration into a navigation index page.
